Artificial Intelligence is the branch of engineering and science devoted to constructing machines that think.
AI is the field of science which concerns itself with building hardware and software that replicates the functions of the human mind.
It is a tax levied by the Government of India on the income of every person.
The revenue functions of the Government of India are managed by the Ministry of Finance.
The year under the Income-tax Law is the period starting from 1st April and ending on 31st March of next calendar year.
Income-tax is to be paid by every person. The term 'person' as defined under the Income-tax Act under section 2(3) covers in its ambit natural as well as artificial persons.

patterns: govt kaise collect karti hai it
responses: Taxes are collected by the Government through three means: a) voluntary payment by taxpayers into various designated Banks.
The rates of Income-tax and corporate taxes are available in the Finance Act passed by the Parliament every year.
The tax that is to be paid by the companies on their income is called as corporate tax. Tax paid by non-corporate assessees is called as Income-tax

patterns: How is advance tax calculated and paid?
responses: Advance tax is to be calculated on the basis of expected tax liability of the year.

patterns: What is tax on regular assessment and how is it paid?
responses: The tax on regular assessment-400 has to be paid within 30 days of receipt of the notice of demand .

patterns: Precautions while filling-up the tax payment challan?
responses:
Head of payment, Type of payment
 Assessment year

patterns: proof of payment from the Banker to whom I have submitted the challan?
responses: Challan filled by taxpayers, should be stamped and returned by the bank.

patterns: How can I know that the Government has received the amount deposited by me as taxes in the bank?
responses: The NSDL website [http://www.tin-nsdl.com], then Challan Status Enquiry.

patterns: Is my responsibility under the Income-tax Act over once taxes are paid?
responses: No, check for tax credits available in your tax credit statement and TDS/TCS certificates
An officer of the Income-tax Department who has been given jurisdiction over a particular geographical area.
A salaried person all that is received from an employer in cash.
An exempt income is not charged to tax
Revenue receipts are recurring in nature.

patterns: Are all receipts charged to tax?
responses: It is that all revenue receipts are taxable, unless they are specifically granted exemption from tax
You have to maintain proof of earning and the records.

patterns: If I win a lottery or prize money in a competition, am I required to pay Income-tax on it?
responses: Yes

patterns: If my income is taxed in India as well as abroad, relief on double taxation?
responses: Yes, you can claim relief.

patterns: Does aggregate turnover include value of inward supplies received on which RCM is payable?
responses: Not on reverse charge basis.

patterns: Inter State supply from one state. Is it liable for registration?
responses: Yes, if aggregate turnover is more than 20 lacs.

patterns: Can we use provisional GSTIN or do we get new GSTIN?
responses: Yes, provisional GSTIN can be used till final GSTIN is issued.

patterns: Whether trader of country liquor is required to migrate to GST from VAT as liquor is out of GST law?
responses: If the person is involved in 100% supply of goods which are not liable for GST, then no registration is required.

patterns: Not liable to tax as mentioned u/s 23 of CGST means nil rated supply?
responses: Not liable to tax means supplies which is not leviable to tax under the CGST/SGST/IGST Act.

patterns: If there are two SEZ units within same state, whether two registrations are required?
responses: SEZs under same PAN in a state require one registration.

patterns: Is an advocate providing interstate supply chargeable for registration?
responses: Exemption from registration has been provided to such suppliers who are making only those supplies on which recipient is liable to discharge GST under RCM.

patterns: When is registration in other state required?
responses: IGST to be paid on inter-state supplies.

patterns: I have migrated under GST but want to register as ISD. Can I can apply now & what is the procedure?
responses: A separate & new registration is required for ISD.
